trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract base class that supports automatic background pagination and tracking content positions across repaginations in addition to the methods and properties of its own base class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base abstracta que suporta automática em segundo plano paginação e controlo conteúdas as posições entre repaginations além das métodos e propriedades de classe base.

trans-unit.source: By default, a DynamicDocumentPaginator will automatically pre-paginate content in the background (this process begins when <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> is `true`, which is the default setting).
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, um DynamicDocumentPaginator será automaticamente paginação previamente conteúdo em segundo plano (este processo começa quando <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>é `true`, que é a predefinição).</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> is `true`, the layout will also be repaginated due to changes in content or changes in <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>é `true`, também irá ser repaginated o esquema devido a alterações no conteúdo ou as alterações no <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> event occurs upon completion of pagination (or repagination) of one or more pages, such as in the following situations: - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> events occur as content is paginated in the background.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>evento ocorre após a conclusão de paginação (ou repagination) de uma ou mais páginas, tais como as seguintes situações:- <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>eventos ocorrem como o conteúdo é paginated em segundo plano.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the implementation, the event may occur upon paginating one or multiple pages (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> specifies which pages have been paginated).
trans-unit.target: Dependendo da implementação, o evento pode ocorrer após paginating uma ou várias páginas (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> Especifica as páginas que tenham sido paginated).</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: - Calls to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync%2A> may cause an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> event to occur if the page specified has not been paginated.
trans-unit.target: -Chamadas para <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync%2A>pode fazer com que um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>evento pode ocorrer se a página especificada não foi paginated.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if background pagination is enabled (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> = `true`) but pagination has only been completed up to the third page, a call of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A> with an argument of 6 will cause pages four, five, six, and seven to be paginated.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se estiver ativada a paginação de em segundo plano (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> = `true`), mas a paginação apenas foi concluída até a terceira página, uma chamada de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A>com um argumento de 6 será causa páginas quatro, cinco, seis e sete para ser paginated.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Upon completion, a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> event will be raised with <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> settings of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A> = 4 and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> = 4.
trans-unit.target: Após a conclusão, uma <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>evento é acionado com <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs>definições de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A>= 4 e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A>= 4.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>

trans-unit.source: - With background pagination enabled (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> = `true`), a change in <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> on flow-format content, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>, may cause repagination and associated <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> events.
trans-unit.target: -Com paginação em segundo plano ativada (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> = `true`), uma alteração na <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>no conteúdo do formato de fluxo, tal como um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>, pode fazer com que repagination e associados <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> has no effect in repagination on fixed-format content, such as <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>, where the visual page size does not affect the layout.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>não tem qualquer efeito repagination no formato fixo conteúdo, tal como <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>, onde o tamanho de página visual não afeta o esquema.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted> event also occurs when background pagination is disabled.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted>evento ocorre também quando a paginação de em segundo plano está desativada.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted>

trans-unit.source: For example, if there is only one page of content and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> = `false`), calling <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A> with an argument of 0 will result in two events: 1.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se existir apenas uma página de conteúdo e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>= `false`), chamar <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A>com um argumento de 0 resultará em dois eventos: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> event with <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> settings of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A> = 0 and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> = 1.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>evento com <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs>definições de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A>= 0 e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A>= 1.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref> for the specified <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, devolve uma <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref> para <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object> especificado

trans-unit.source: The object to return the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref> of.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para devolver o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref> do.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref> of the given object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref> de objecto fornecido.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the zero-based page number of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, devolve o número de página baseado em zero de especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If pages prior to the `contentPosition` have not been formatted, they will be paginated synchronously prior to returning the requested page number.
trans-unit.target: Se páginas antes o `contentPosition` não foram formatado, irão ser paginated forma síncrona antes de devolver o número de página pedida.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A> provides similar functionality as GetPageNumber, but with asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A>Fornece uma funcionalidade semelhante como GetPageNumber, mas com a operação assíncrona.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The content position whose page number is needed.
trans-unit.target: A posição conteúda cujo número de página é necessária.

trans-unit.source: An representing zero-based page number where the specified contentPosition appears.
trans-unit.target: Um que representa o número de página baseado em zero onde especificado contentPosition aparece.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously, returns (through the This method raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"></xref> event) the zero-based page number of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: No modo assíncrono, devolve (através deste método gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"> </xref> evento) o número de página baseado em zero de especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The only way to cancel the asynchronous operation of this method is to cancel all asynchronous operations.
trans-unit.target: É a única forma de cancelar a operação assíncrona deste método para cancelar todas as operações assíncronas.

trans-unit.source: Contrast this with the other overload of this method: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29>.
trans-unit.target: Contraste isto com a outra sobrecarga deste método: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Este método gera o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The page number is passed to the event as one of the event arguments.
trans-unit.target: O número de página é transmitido para o evento como um dos argumentos de evento.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29> for how to use this method to get the page number.
trans-unit.target: Consulte <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29>para saber como utilizar este método para obter o número de página.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: The content position whose page number is needed.
trans-unit.target: A posição conteúda cujo número de página é necessária.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously, returns (through the This method raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"></xref> event) the zero-based page number of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: No modo assíncrono, devolve (através deste método gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"> </xref> evento) o número de página baseado em zero de especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This overload of the method makes it possible to cancel this asynchronous operation without cancelling all asynchronous operations.
trans-unit.target: Esta sobrecarga do método torna possível cancelar esta operação assíncrona sem cancelar todas as operações assíncronas.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Este método gera o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The following steps illustrate how to retrieve the page number of a given `contentPosition` asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Os passos seguintes mostram como obter o número de página de um determinado `contentPosition` no modo assíncrono.

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventHandler> delegate and add it to be notified of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted> events.
trans-unit.target: Criar um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventHandler>delegar e adicioná-lo para ser notificado de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Call GetPageNumberAsync specifying the `contentPosition` desired and a unique `userState` object that will be used to identify the asynchronous task.
trans-unit.target: Chamar GetPageNumberAsync especificando o `contentPosition` pretendida e um único `userState` objeto que será utilizado para identificar a tarefa assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: When the event occurs and the delegate is called, compare the event's <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> property with the original GetPageNumberAsync `userState` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Quando o evento ocorre e o delegado é chamado, compare o evento <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> propriedade com o GetPageNumberAsync original `userState` parâmetro.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> property matches the original GetPageNumberAsync `userState`, the operation is complete and the page number is ready.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> propriedade corresponde a GetPageNumberAsync original `userState`, a operação foi concluída e o número de página está pronto.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: (The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.ContentPosition%2A> property will also match the original GetPageNumberAsync `contentPosition` parameter.) 5.
trans-unit.target: (O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.ContentPosition%2A> propriedade também corresponderá a GetPageNumberAsync original `contentPosition` parâmetro.)</xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.ContentPosition%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs> 5.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.PageNumber%2A> property contains the zero-based page number of the specified `contentPosition`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.PageNumber%2A> propriedade contém o número de página baseado em zero de especificado `contentPosition`.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.PageNumber%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumber%2A> provides similar functionality as <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A>, but for synchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumber%2A>Fornece uma funcionalidade semelhante como <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A>, mas para operação síncrona.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A></xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumber%2A>

trans-unit.source: The content position element to return the page number of.
trans-unit.target: O elemento da posição de conteúdo para devolver o número de página de.

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier for the asynchronous task.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador exclusivo para a tarefa assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync*> has completed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync*>foi concluída.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the position of the specified page in the document's content.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém a posição da página especificada no conteúdo do documento.

trans-unit.source: The page whose position is needed.
trans-unit.target: A página cuja posição é necessária.

trans-unit.source: A representing the position of page.
trans-unit.target: A que representa a posição do page .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether pagination is performed automatically in the background in response to certain events, such as a change in page size.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a paginação é executada automaticamente em segundo plano em resposta a determinados eventos, como uma alteração de tamanho de página.

trans-unit.source: When `true`, pagination is performed in the background, raising <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted> events as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: Quando `true`, paginação é executada em segundo plano, gerar <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted>eventos conforme apropriado.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>

trans-unit.source: Pagination of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> content, as distinct from a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> is not affected by changes to the visual <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Paginação de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>conteúdo, as distinct from um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>não é afetada por alterações para o visual <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if background pagination is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se estiver ativada a paginação de fundo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when all document content has been paginated.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando todos os conteúdos do documento foi paginated.

trans-unit.source: When PaginationCompleted occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A> is `true` until a new pagination is initiated.
trans-unit.target: Quando ocorre a PaginationCompleted, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A>é `true` até uma novo paginação é iniciada.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one or more content pages have been paginated.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma ou mais páginas conteúdas tem sido paginated.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> properties <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> identify the range of pages paginated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs>propriedades <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A>identificar o intervalo de páginas paginated.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A></xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
